price: ពិតប្រាកដណាស់អល់ឡោះ គ្មានអ្វីមួយនៅលើផែនដី និង លើមេឃលាក់បាំងពីទ្រង់បានឡើយ។
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ شَيۡءٞ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha lā yakhfā ʿalayhi shayon fī al-arḍi walā fī al-samāi
